title: One Happiness and Peace are Possible
summary: Buddhist practice notes and teachings - buddhism-books-you-are-here

thoughts.content:
# One Happiness and Peace are Possible

A gardener has the skill to transform garbage into compost and that compost into a flower 

## The First Miracle of Mindfulness

### Presence

“A fundamental condition for love is your own presence.”

One can only live in the present.
